channel.title: play on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in play on Barefoot Rob

item.title: super sidetracked
item.description: 12:54 Friday 30 March 2018 JST Actually have gotten three (3) meetings done online: Prentiss and Ari helped with Mankind Project Tokyo; Ari said he will write some stuff for either Mankind Project Tokyo Meetup or My Power Circle. Oriane and I checked in with each other on our respective projects. Planning to ask which inkan I can use for my personal seal today; maybe I will go do that now on my way to work at TY.

item.title: play day
item.description: 09:35 Saturday 06 May 2017 JST Today I am going to Yurakucho to see Mika and Kai at an outdoor music festival. Kai will attend a concert that starts in 25 minutes. I am probably planning too long of a day, but after the festival, I plan to go to Womb for a SOGO event. Only crummy thing is I have to wear shoes to the SOGO event. Not sure if it’s a Womb rule or a SOGO rule.
